channel.title: Panic PvP
channel.description:
Welcome everybody to Panic PvP!
The makers of FreedomX and Panic PvP 718 are back with another server, Panic PvP 317! In Panic PvP pk'ing is an important aspect of the gameplay, but it's not the only feature of the game. We have several NPC/playerzones where you can chill, skill, kill NPC's and gain achievements.
We are a ever-growing server with new content coming in almost daily! So make sure to check us out.
Website: [url=http://panicpvp.com/]Panic PvP[/url] Forums: [url=http://panicpvp.com/forums/]PanicPvP[/url] Download: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/86414409/Panic%20PvP.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/86414409/Panic%20PvP.jar[/url]
Features:
- Pk'ing system with Bounty targets and EP - The statues will go on top of your regular loot! - Lots of bosses to kill and more to come - Lots of safespots, not everything has to be in the wilderness - A few skills are added, and new ones are coming - Barrows to gain some quick barrows equipment - Lots of achievements so you have a goal in Panic PvP - NPC's to do something different than Pk'ing - Duel Arena - Every Special Attack is added and accurate enough
There is much more to find out at Panic PvP!
Pictures: [SPOILER=Pictures] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/d9y83.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2lcws4w.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/34nfzpc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/nv1px0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/14torxk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2z3t8rd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/6e40o0.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/35i41ab.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2qkqgyd.png[/img] [/SPOILER]

item.title: Panic PvP
item.dc:creator: @amarad amarad
item.description:
@amarad wrote:

Welcome everybody to Panic PvP!

The makers of FreedomX and Panic PvP 718 are back with another server, Panic PvP 317!
In Panic PvP pk’ing is an important aspect of the gameplay, but it’s not the only feature of the game.
We have several NPC/playerzones where you can chill, skill, kill NPC’s and gain achievements.

We are a ever-growing server with new content coming in almost daily! So make sure to check us out.

Website: Panic PvP
Forums: PanicPvP
Download: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/86414409/Panic%20PvP.jar

Features:

  • Pk’ing system with Bounty targets and EP - The statues will go on top of your regular loot!
  • Lots of bosses to kill and more to come
  • Lots of safespots, not everything has to be in the wilderness
  • A few skills are added, and new ones are coming
  • Barrows to gain some quick barrows equipment
  • Lots of achievements so you have a goal in Panic PvP
  • NPC’s to do something different than Pk’ing
  • Duel Arena
  • Every Special Attack is added and accurate enough

There is much more to find out at Panic PvP!
